title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 581-2.5 - Administrative resolution of violations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 581-2.5 - Administrative resolution of violations

State Regulations
(a) Violations may be resolved
administratively by agreement(s) entered into with any person(s) responsible
for a violation. (b) An
administrative resolution may include a compromise of penalties, injunctive
relief, and such other measures or actions as the agency, the enforcement
committee, or the executive director, deems necessary or appropriate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
581-2.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
